NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 17:29 IST
 National Institute of Technology, Manipur
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Manipur |  Salary : 37,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

The National Institute of Technology Manipur (NIT Manipur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. Here we mentioned the age limit, selection Process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Manipur

NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	ualification
Junior Research Fellow	01	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering

Age Limit for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025

Intervew

Salary Structure for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 42,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the email address given below.

Email Address

prabhat.kumar@nitmanipur.ac.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	12-08-2025
Last Date of Application	05-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
